# goevent
event generator that use github.com/fzerorubigd/goql - just a funny project

# Install

```
go get -u "github.com/vahid-sohrabloo/goevent"
```

# Usage 

Usage of goevent:
```
goevent  -p, --package string
    	the package to query against
```

# Example


```
goevent -p "github.com/vahid-sohrabloo/goevent/example"
```

Output

```
package example
//     DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE BY HAND -- YOUR CHANGES WILL BE OVERWRITTEN
import(
	"sort"
	"google.golang.org/grpc"
	
)


func (parentEvent *GrpcEvent) OnStreamServerInterceptor(fn func (*[]grpc.StreamServerInterceptor))  {
	parentEvent.StreamServerInterceptor=append(parentEvent.StreamServerInterceptor,fn)
}

func (parentEvent *GrpcEvent) FireStreamServerInterceptor(list *[]grpc.StreamServerInterceptor)  {
	for _,event:= range parentEvent.ListStreamServerInterceptor {
		event(list)
	}
}


func (parentEvent *GrpcEvent) OnUnaryServerInterceptor(fn func (*[]grpc.UnaryServerInterceptor))  {
	parentEvent.UnaryServerInterceptor=append(parentEvent.UnaryServerInterceptor,fn)
}

func (parentEvent *GrpcEvent) FireUnaryServerInterceptor(list *[]grpc.UnaryServerInterceptor)  {
	for _,event:= range parentEvent.ListUnaryServerInterceptor {
		event(list)
	}
}


func (parentEvent *GrpcEvent) OnInit(fn func (*grpc.Server))  {
	parentEvent.Init=append(parentEvent.Init,fn)
}

func (parentEvent *GrpcEvent) FireInit(grpcServer *grpc.Server)  {
	for _,event:= range parentEvent.ListInit {
		event(grpcServer)
	}
}


func (parentEvent *GrpcEvent) OnStart(fn func (grpc.Server))  {
	parentEvent.Start=append(parentEvent.Start,fn)
}

func (parentEvent *GrpcEvent) FireStart(grpcServer grpc.Server)  {
	for _,event:= range parentEvent.ListStart {
		event(grpcServer)
	}
}

```
